title: President of the Republic receives Head of Libyan Government of National Unity
text: President of the Republic, Mr Abdelmadjid Tebboune received, on Sunday, Head of the Libyan government of national unity, Mr Abdelhamid Dbeiba, on a visit to Algeria, accompanied by a large delegation.

The talks focused on the ways and means to intensify and strengthen bilateral cooperation in all areas, including security coordination, the fight against cross-border crime, the protection of common borders, as well as the intensification of trade, through the opening of airspace and other avenues that can be opened.

The visit constituted an opportunity to reaffirm the pivotal role of Algeria in the consolidation of inter-Libyan reconciliation and the completion of the political settlement process, being the only way to guarantee sovereignty of the Libyan State and its territorial unity.
